module.name: ganalyticspro
module.description: Install the Google Analytics 4 (GA4) tag on your site and collect data for your GA4 and Universal Analytics (UA), with enhanced e-commerce, reports in your Google Analytics account
module.author: Business Tech
module.confirmUninstall: Are you sure you want to uninstall the module Google Analytics : GA4 and Universal-Analytics (your configuration will be lost)?
